DOC.brief_title: An Evaluation Effectiveness Proprietary Probiotic Blend Functional Constipation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female adult , age 18 65 year BMI 18.5 kg/m2 35.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Subject child bear potential . Defined female hysterectomy oophorectomy , bilateral tubal ligation postmenopausal ( natural surgically > 1 year since last menstruation ) OR Female subject childbearing potential must agree use medically approve method birth control negative urine pregnancy test result . Acceptable method birth control include : Hormonal contraceptive include oral contraceptive , hormone birth control patch ( Ortho Evra ) , vaginal contraceptive ring ( NuvaRing ) , injectable contraceptive ( DepoProvera , Lunelle ) , hormone implant ( Norplant System ) Doublebarrier method ( condom spermicide diaphragm spermicide ) Nonhormonal intrauterine device Vasectomy partner Nonheterosexual lifestyle Subjects must least two follow criterion base subject selfreporting , past 3 month symptom begin least 6 month ago : Two criterion must meet subject : 1 . Straining least 25 % defecation 2 . Lumpy hard stool least 25 % defecation 3 . Sensation incomplete evacuation least 25 % defecation 4 . Sensation anorectal obstruction/blockage least 25 % defecation Fewer three defecation per week Loose stool rarely present without use laxative Insufficient criterion Irritable Bowel Syndrome Subjects average stool type < 3 Bristol Stool Scale assess two week runin period ( confirmed baseline review bowel habit diary ) . Subjects agree maintain current level physical activity throughout trial period . Subjects agree discontinue use probiotic supplement include food supplement probiotic ( i.e . yogurt ) fiber supplement include food label supplement fiber Subjects agree discontinue use overthecounter laxative medication ( rescue medication provide ) within 2 week screen throughout trial . Subjects successfully complete runin period complete least 80 % RunIn diary entry , 100 % IPAQ questionnaires provide fecal sample . Subjects understand nature purpose study include potential risk side effect Subjects willing complete study procedure include study related questionnaire comply study requirement Subjects give voluntary , write , inform consent participate study . Subjects pregnant , breastfeed plan become pregnant throughout course study . Subjects unstable medical condition Subjects major disease cardiovascular , renal , hepatic , gastrointestinal , pulmonary endocrine system Subjects Type I Type II diabetes Subjects history major gastrointestinal complication ( i.e . Crohn 's disease , ulcer , cancer , ulcerative colitis ) History current diagnosis cancer ( except successfully treat basal cell carcinoma ) diagnose less 5 year prior screen . Subjects cancer full remission 5 year diagnosis acceptable Subjects neurological disorder significant psychiatric illness ( significance determine Qualified Investigator ) Subjects immunocompromised ( HIV positive , antirejection medication , rheumatoid arthritis ) Subjects medical condition history abdominal surgery deem exclusionary Qualified Investigator Subjects feature may suggest serious underlie cause chronic constipation rectal bleeding , anemia , abrupt weight loss ( 5kg within past month prior randomization ) , gastrointestinal polyp , first degree family history colorectal cancer . Subjects active eating disorder Subjects use overthecounter prescription laxative medication within 2 week prior screen . Subjects use probiotic fiber supplement ( probiotic/fiber enrich food ) within 4 week prior screen Subjects use antibiotic within 4 week prior screen Subjects use medication investigator opinion know cause constipation ( i.e . opiate ) within 4 week screen Subjects use Medicinal Marijuana Subjects use illicit drug history alcohol drug abuse within past 6 month Subjects currently consume great 2 standard alcoholic drink per day . Subjects participate clinical research trial within 30 day prior randomization . Subjects allergy sensitivity investigational product ingredient Subjects cognitively impair and/or unable give inform consent Subjects abnormal laboratory result medical psychological condition , opinion Principle Investigator , may adversely affect subject ' ability complete study measure may pose significant risk subject .
